comment.author: 48355950@N05
comment._content: What a wonderful surprise to find these photos of Bert. The event was the celebration of the 50th anniversary of his first solo in a Piper Cub. In 1976, Bert was Chief Instructor at Gibbs Flite Center. That year, he hired me as a flight instructor when I retired from the Navy. Bert could be cranky at times, but he was a great old guy and a good friend.
